title: Meghan Trainor reveals what it's REALLY like attending Kanye West's Sunday Service
text:
Kanye West performs a weekly Sunday Service and has just performed in Jamaica with the help of a choir with 120 people, it has been reported.

And on Thursday, American singer Meghan Trainor revealed what it's really like attending Kanye's Sunday Service.

The 25-year-old appeared on Smallzy's Surgery on Nova and said that the service 'feels like a party' and makes her feel 'really happy.'

'I grew up in a very boring old-school church vibe and this feels like a party': Meghan Trainor (pictured) reveals what it's REALLY like attending Kanye West's Sunday Service

'I grew up in a very, like, boring old-school church vibe and this feels like a party in a celebration of life,' Meghan said.

'Like, no matter what you believe in, he doesn't like, he doesn't throw stuff at your face like "believe in this."

She added: 'It's just like, "let us have a good time, let us celebrate our families and let us celebrate that we got to wake up today," and that's how I feel. And when I leave there, I feel like I can accomplish anything and it just makes you really happy!'

Dishing the details: 'Like, no matter what you believe in, he doesn't like, he doesn't throw stuff at your face like "believe in this," Meghan said. Kanye is pictured at one of his Sunday Services

The 25-year-old singer revealed she felt 'so cool' after she attended six of Kanye's Sunday Services alongside her husband Daryl Sabara and her younger brother.

The regular gatherings are known to host hundreds of fans, including some Hollywood stars, and the Kardashian and Jenner family.

Last month, Once Upon A Time in Hollywood star Brad Pitt surprised fellow attendees showing up unannounced.

Popular: The regular gatherings are known to host hundreds of fans, including some Hollywood stars, and the Kardashian and Jenner family (Kanye is pictured at his Sunday Service in Jamaica)

Meanwhile, Meghan, who is currently working on releasing her third studio album, Treat Myself, said that she used Kim Kardashian's new shapewear brand, Skims, in her new music video for the song Wave.

Speaking to PopSugar earlier this month, she said: 'I really loved Kim Kardashian's Skims and how they looked and we used them in the music video.'

She added: 'I'm wearing them and a lot of my dancers are wearing them.'
description: Kanye West performs a weekly Sunday Service and has just performed in Jamaica with the help of a choir with 120 people, it has been reported.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
